Class DatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.example.quarantinetracker.ui.DatabaseHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class DatabaseHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    Class that helps with the usage of the SQLite database.

    Berenton

      • getReportData

        public android.database.Cursor getReportData(int month,
                                             int day)
        Returns reports with the given date from the main table sorted by the most recently added.
        Parameters:
        month - Month of the searched date (1-12)
        day - Day of the searched date (1-31)
        Returns:
        Cursor containing the data

      • getTitleData

        public android.database.Cursor getTitleData()
        Returns all activity names from the activity table sorted by the most recently added.
        Returns:
        Cursor containing the data.

        Parameters:
        location - Location to be inserted into location table.
        Returns:
        boolean whether or not succeeded

      • insertPerson

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        boolean whether or not succeeded

      • insertReport

        public boolean insertReport(int year,
                            int month,
                            int day,
                            int hour,
                            int minute,
                            java.lang.String activity,
                            java.lang.String location,
                            java.lang.String assessment,
                            java.lang.String people,
                            java.lang.String misc)
        Inserts the given parameters into the main SQL table as one row.
        Parameters:
        year - Year of the report INT
        month - Month of the report INT
        day - Day of the report INT
        hour - Hour of the report INT
        minute - Minute of the report INT
        activity - Activity/Title field of the report String
        location - Location field of the report String
        assessment - Assessment field of the report String
        people - People field of the report String
        misc - Miscellaneous field of the report String
        Returns:
        boolean on whether or not succeeded

      • insertTitle

        public boolean insertTitle(java.lang.String activity)
        Inserts the given activity into the activity table.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity to be inserted into activity table.
        Returns:
        boolean whether or not succeeded
